translated: The consecration is given to those who are within the boundary where the consecration is to be performed.

original: 'di la shi ba'i gnas nyid ni rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la shi ba'i gnas nyid ni rgyu ma yin no //
translated: The place where the consecration is to be performed is not the cause.

original: mtshams kyi bar na 'dug pa la lus sam gzhan gyis reg pas ji tsam non pa der gtogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: mtshams kyi bar na 'dug pa la lus sam gzhan gyis reg pas ji tsam non pa der gtogs pa rnams so //
translated: If one is in the middle of the boundary, the consecration is given to those who are within the area covered by the body or by the hand.

original: gang na nor dang 'dra ba der 'dug pa de'i khongs su yo byad gtogs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang na nor dang 'dra ba der 'dug pa de'i khongs su yo byad gtogs pa nyid yin no //
translated: If the consecration is given in a place where there is wealth, the wealth belongs to those who are within the boundary.

original: nor dang 'dra ba gzhan na 'dug pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //üîΩskur ba bskur bar bya bas ma spangs pa ni de'i nyid yin no //
analyzed: nor dang 'dra ba gzhan na 'dug pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o // skur ba bskur bar bya bas ma spangs pa ni de'i nyid yin no //
translated: If the wealth is in another place, the consecration should be given there.üîΩIf the consecration is not given by one who is to give it, it is not given by that person.

original: spangs ba ni skur bar byed pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: spangs ba ni skur bar byed pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: If it is given by one who is to give it, it is given by that person.

original: des spangs na yang ngo //
analyzed: des spangs na yang ngo //
translated: If he gives it up, he is not.

original: phyi rol du yang mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pa dag 'ba' zhig gis byin gyis rlob pa mi 'chags so //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pa dag 'ba' zhig gis byin gyis rlob pa mi 'chags so //
translated: Also, if he is outside the boundary, he is not.

original: dbyung ba dang rim gro dang chos mnyan pa dang yon bshad ma byas par byin gyis brlab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dbyung ba dang rim gro dang chos mnyan pa dang yon bshad ma byas par byin gyis brlab par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not give his consent without being asked to do so, without being served, without listening to the Dharma, and without explaining the virtues.

original: lhung bzed dang chos gos khyim gzhan na @68b 'dug pa nyid ni khyim bdag gis gang la byin pa de dbang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: lhung bzed dang chos gos khyim gzhan na @68b 'dug pa nyid ni khyim bdag gis gang la byin pa de dbang ba nyid yin no //
translated: If the alms bowl and robes are in another‚Äôs house, the one to whom the householder gave them has control over them.

original: gal te dbang zhing des phongs pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te dbang zhing des phongs pa yin na'o //
translated: If he has control over them and is in need of them.

original: sbyin par mi byed na blangs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin par mi byed na blangs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: If he does not give them, he is in possession of what was taken.

original: mthar gyis na dang po'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis na dang po'o //
translated: If he is in the beginning stage, he is in possession of what was taken.

original: med pa nyid yin zhing ma bsngos par bor na song ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: med pa nyid yin zhing ma bsngos par bor na song ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: If he has no control over them and they are lost without being given away, he is in possession of what was taken.

original: de ni mthar gyis dang 'dra'o //üîΩbu lon pa byung na de la gzhal bar bya ba'i tshad kyis shi ba'i yo byad de dbang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ni mthar gyis dang 'dra'o // bu lon pa byung na de la gzhal bar bya ba'i tshad kyis shi ba'i yo byad de dbang ba nyid yin no //
translated: This is the same as the beginning stage.üîΩIf a debt comes up, he is in possession of what was taken.

original: bgos na yang ngo //
analyzed: bgos na yang ngo //
translated: If it is distributed, he is in possession of what was taken.

original: de dang lhan cig rnam par gzhag pa de la sbyin par bya ba nyid dam blang bar bya ba nyid gang yin pa ste de nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig rnam par gzhag pa de la sbyin par bya ba nyid dam blang bar bya ba nyid gang yin pa ste de nyid ma yin no //
translated: and the one who is to be given to, or who is to take, that which is established together with that is not the same as that.

original: des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bu lon chags pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bu lon chags pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, he does not become indebted to his fellow brahmacarins.

original: lag gi blas dkon mchog gi blangs pa nyid yin na de'i ji snyed pa de snyed mnyam par bsab bo //
analyzed: lag gi blas dkon mchog gi blangs pa nyid yin na de'i ji snyed pa de snyed mnyam par bsab bo //
translated: If he has taken it from the Three Jewels, he repays as much as he has taken.

original: nad g-yog dang bcas pa nyid yin na yo byad drug po de dbang ba nyid yin pas byin gyis brlab par mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: nad g-yog dang bcas pa nyid yin na yo byad drug po de dbang ba nyid yin pas byin gyis brlab par mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: If he has taken it from the sick, since he has control over the six articles, he does not need to consecrate them.

original: de ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dang bcas pa las so //
analyzed: de ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dang bcas pa las so //
translated: He has superior, middling, and inferior goods.

original: du ma nyid yin na de thun mong ngo //
analyzed: du ma nyid yin na de thun mong ngo //
translated: If he has many, they are common.

original: de'i don du song ba nyid yin la nad pa shin sbyin bar bya ba nyid do //üîΩrdzas de mi dbang ba nyid la ni mi sbyin no //
analyzed: de'i don du song ba nyid yin la nad pa shin sbyin bar bya ba nyid do // rdzas de mi dbang ba nyid la ni mi sbyin no //
translated: If he has gone for the sake of that, he should give to the sick.üîΩHe should not give that substance if he does not have control over it.

original: gzhan du gnas par khas blangs pa la sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du gnas par khas blangs pa la sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not give if he has accepted it for another.

original: 'di la bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad dbang ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad dbang ba nyid do //
translated: If the owner is not fully ordained, all are masters of the object.

original: nad pas smras pas sbyin pa phrin yang ji skad smras pa bzhin bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: nad pas smras pas sbyin pa phrin yang ji skad smras pa bzhin bya ba nyid do //
translated: If the owner is sick, the gift is to be given as he says.

original: shi ba nyid kyi dus na rdzas nyid bsgrub pa la ni nor bdag mi dbang ngo //
analyzed: shi ba nyid kyi dus na rdzas nyid bsgrub pa la ni nor bdag mi dbang ngo //
translated: If the owner dies, the gift is to be given to his estate.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni dbang ngo //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni dbang ngo //
translated: If the owner is a householder, the gift is to be given to him.

original: khyim pas bu dang chung ma phul nas shi na ci bder bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pas bu dang chung ma phul nas shi na ci bder bya'o //
translated: If the owner is a householder and dies after having given his son or wife, the gift is to be given as he says.

original: glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang dre'u dang go cha rnams ni rgyal po la dbul lo //
analyzed: glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang dre'u dang go cha rnams ni rgyal po la dbul lo //
translated: If the owner is an elephant, a horse, a donkey, a mule, or armor, the gift is to be given to the king.

original: dbyig dang gser dang gzhan byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams ni gsum la'o //
analyzed: dbyig dang gser dang gzhan byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams ni gsum la'o //
translated: If the owner is gold, silver, or other precious objects, the gift is to be given to the three.

original: rin po che rnams kyang ngo //üîΩmu tig rnams ni gal te gzhan yod na de'i skal bas sam lhag pa nyid yin yang rung /
analyzed: rin po che rnams kyang ngo // mu tig rnams ni gal te gzhan yod na de'i skal bas sam lhag pa nyid yin yang rung /
translated: If the owner is a precious object, the gift is to be given to the king.

original: gal te med na de bzhin du sangs rgyas la'o //
analyzed: gal te med na de bzhin du sangs rgyas la'o //
translated: If the owner is a pearl, the gift is to be given to the owner of the pearl, or to the king if there is no owner.

original: tshon rtsi chen po rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: tshon rtsi chen po rnams kyang ngo //
translated: If the owner is a great dye, the gift is to be given to the king.

original: de dag ni btags te dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal du bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni btags te dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal du bya'o //
translated: They are to be used for cleaning the temple.

original: de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs dang dri gtsang khang dang mchod rten gyi yo byad @69a * //
analyzed: de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs dang dri gtsang khang dang mchod rten gyi yo byad @69a * //
translated: The Buddha's images, temples, and stupas are for the Buddha.

original: du bya'o // chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'dri ba dang seng ge'i khri dag gi'o //
analyzed: du bya'o // chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'dri ba dang seng ge'i khri dag gi'o //
translated: The scriptures of the Buddha's word and lion thrones are for the Dharma.

original: theg pa la ni sku gzugs la'o //
analyzed: theg pa la ni sku gzugs la'o //
translated: The images are for the Vehicle.

original: rgyal mtshan dang de'i srog shing dag ni rgyal mtshan gyi don du'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang de'i srog shing dag ni rgyal mtshan gyi don du'o //
translated: The banners and their poles are for the victory banners.

original: der rung ba'i srog shing rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: der rung ba'i srog shing rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The poles suitable for that are also for that.

original: gzhan dag dang mtshon cha rnams ni dge 'dun la'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag dang mtshon cha rnams ni dge 'dun la'o //
translated: The weapons are for the Sangha.

original: de dag ni khar sil gyi yu ba dang khab dang gri gur byas te brim mo //
analyzed: de dag ni khar sil gyi yu ba dang khab dang gri gur byas te brim mo //
translated: They are to be used for the handles of musical instruments, needles, and knives.

original: dge 'dun gyi gzhan ni bzhag pa dang bgo ba dang bza' ba dag tu ci rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gzhan ni bzhag pa dang bgo ba dang bza' ba dag tu ci rigs par bya'o //
translated: The other things of the Sangha are to be used as appropriate for storage, clothing, and food.

original: zhing dang khang khyim dang tshong khang dang gnas mal dang mgar spyad dang gser mkhan gyi lag cha dang 'dreg mkhan gyi lag cha dang rdza mkhan gyi lag cha dang shing mkhan gyi lag cha dang / bsil yab mkhan gyi lag cha dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang /
analyzed: zhing dang khang khyim dang tshong khang dang gnas mal dang mgar spyad dang gser mkhan gyi lag cha dang 'dreg mkhan gyi lag cha dang rdza mkhan gyi lag cha dang shing mkhan gyi lag cha dang / bsil yab mkhan gyi lag cha dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang /
translated: fields, houses, shops, beds, tools of blacksmiths, barbers, potters, carpenters, and fan makers, male and female servants, workers, laborers,

original: ba lang dang ma he dang ra dang lug dang sman dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan bcos kyi glegs bam dang myur du mi 'grub pa'i dam rgya ni dang por 'os pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: ba lang dang ma he dang ra dang lug dang sman dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan bcos kyi glegs bam dang myur du mi 'grub pa'i dam rgya ni dang por 'os pa nyid yin no //
translated: cows, buffaloes, goats, sheep, medicine, books of the Buddha‚Äôs teachings, and seals that are not quickly accomplished are suitable for the first.

original: ras dang ras yug chen dang be'u ras dang / mchil lham dang lham sgro gu can dang 'bru mar dang 'bru mar snod dang bya ma bum dang ril ba spyi blugs dang glegs bam gzhan dang dam rgya gzhan dang tshon rtsi gzhan dag ni gnyis par 'os pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: ras dang ras yug chen dang be'u ras dang / mchil lham dang lham sgro gu can dang 'bru mar dang 'bru mar snod dang bya ma bum dang ril ba spyi blugs dang glegs bam gzhan dang dam rgya gzhan dang tshon rtsi gzhan dag ni gnyis par 'os pa nyid yin no //
translated: Cloth, woolen cloth, leather, shoes, oil, oil containers, water pots, water filters, books, other seals, and other dyes are suitable for the second.

original: 'bras dang til dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang mon sran gre'u dang 'bru gzhan dang bza' ba dang btung ba dag ni gsum par 'os pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'bras dang til dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang mon sran gre'u dang 'bru gzhan dang bza' ba dang btung ba dag ni gsum par 'os pa nyid yin no //
translated: Rice, sesame, barley, beans, peas, and other grains, as well as food and drink, are suitable for the third.

original: gzhir gtogs pa gos kyi gzhi'o //
analyzed: gzhir gtogs pa gos kyi gzhi'o //
translated: The basis is the basis of the robe.

original: glegs bu dang glegs bu phyed dag mnyam par bya'o //
analyzed: glegs bu dang glegs bu phyed dag mnyam par bya'o //
translated: The patches should be equal in size.

original: gzhal ba'i phyir de'i tshad kyi chags shing bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal ba'i phyir de'i tshad kyi chags shing bcang bar bya'o //
translated: In order to measure them, a cord of that size should be made and used.

original: tshal bu dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: tshal bu dag kyang ngo //
translated: The small patches are also like that.

original: de'i tshad kyi chags shing bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshad kyi chags shing bcang bar bya'o //
translated: A cord of that size should be made and used.

original: de'i tshe tshad ni sor bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ni sor bzhi'o //
translated: The size of that is four finger breadths.

original: bya rog gi mtho gang yang ngo //
analyzed: bya rog gi mtho gang yang ngo //
translated: Or one cubit of the crow.

original: chung tshad ni sor gnyis sam phyed dang gsum mam mtheb sor gcig go //
analyzed: chung tshad ni sor gnyis sam phyed dang gsum mam mtheb sor gcig go //
translated: The small size is two finger breadths, one and a half, or one thumb breadth.

original: sa la chos gos gding bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sa la chos gos gding bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not spread the Dharma robe on the ground.

original: de'i don du bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don du bstan par bya'o //
translated: For that purpose, a support should be made.

original: shing las byas pa'am smyig ma las byas pa gru bzhi btod pa'i phyir tha gu gzhug pa'i bu ga btod pa ni de zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shing las byas pa'am smyig ma las byas pa gru bzhi btod pa'i phyir tha gu gzhug pa'i bu ga btod pa ni de zhes bya'o //
translated: Made of wood or bamboo, with a square opening, with a hole for a string to be inserted, that is called a support.

original: chos gos ji tsam par ro //üîΩgri gus dra'o //
analyzed: chos gos ji tsam par ro // gri gus dra'o //
translated: The size of the robe.üîΩIt should be carried in a sheath.

original: de @69b bcang bar bya'o //üîΩbya rog gi mchu lta bu'am /
analyzed: de @69b bcang bar bya'o // bya rog gi mchu lta bu'am /
translated: It should be carried in a bag.üîΩLike the beak of a crow,

original: bya gag gi gshog pa lta bur ro //
analyzed: bya gag gi gshog pa lta bur ro //
translated: or like the wing of a parrot.

original: lcags las byas pa las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: lcags las byas pa las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: It should not be made of iron.

original: yu brtsi can dang khra bo mi bcang ngo //
analyzed: yu brtsi can dang khra bo mi bcang ngo //
translated: It should not be carried in a sheath with a handle or with various colors.

original: sor drug gi tshad las lhag pa mi bcang do //
analyzed: sor drug gi tshad las lhag pa mi bcang do //
translated: It should not be carried longer than six finger breadths.

original: kha cig las ni brgyad las mi bcang zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig las ni brgyad las mi bcang zhes so //
translated: Some say it should not be carried longer than eight finger breadths.

original: sor bzhi pas thung ba ni dgos pa med do //
analyzed: sor bzhi pas thung ba ni dgos pa med do //
translated: Shorter than four finger breadths is not necessary.

original: lci ba'i byug pas bskus par btsem mo //
analyzed: lci ba'i byug pas bskus par btsem mo //
translated: It should be sewn with a paste of clay.

original: lci ba med na chag chag btab cing phyags par ro //
analyzed: lci ba med na chag chag btab cing phyags par ro //
translated: If there is no clay, it should be sewn with chalk and cleaned.

original: de btsem par bya'o //
analyzed: de btsem par bya'o //
translated: It should be sewn.

original: khab kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: khab kyis kyang ngo //
translated: It should also be sewn with a needle.

original: de bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bcang bar bya'o //
translated: It should be carried.

original: ra gan dang zangs ma dang khar ba dang lcags las byas pa las gzhan pa mi bcang ngo //
analyzed: ra gan dang zangs ma dang khar ba dang lcags las byas pa las gzhan pa mi bcang ngo //
translated: It should not be made of tin, copper, horn, or iron.

original: kha cig las zangs dang lcags dang rno ba dag las byas pa zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig las zangs dang lcags dang rno ba dag las byas pa zhes so //
translated: Some say it should be made of copper, iron, or sharp [materials].

original: de'i khab ral sbu gu lta bu'am chang pa lta bu bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i khab ral sbu gu lta bu'am chang pa lta bu bcang bar bya'o //
translated: The case for the needle should be like a tube or a bag.

original: de ngo tsha med pa dang dge tshul dag las rag las par bya'o //
analyzed: de ngo tsha med pa dang dge tshul dag las rag las par bya'o //
translated: He should be dependent on those who are not shameless and on novices.

original: mi shes pa dang mi dran pa dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa dag ma yin pa dag las yang ngo //
analyzed: mi shes pa dang mi dran pa dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa dag ma yin pa dag las yang ngo //
translated: He should also be dependent on those who are not ignorant, not forgetful, and who are in a natural state.

original: khab dang gri dag btsas mi zos par bya ba'i phyir spra tshil gyis bskus pa'i ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: khab dang gri dag btsas mi zos par bya ba'i phyir spra tshil gyis bskus pa'i ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: In order that the needle and the knife do not get lost, he should put them in a piece of cloth smeared with resin.

original: mi 'byil bar bya ba'i phyir chos gos la sgrog rten byas te sgrog zungs gdags so //
analyzed: mi 'byil bar bya ba'i phyir chos gos la sgrog rten byas te sgrog zungs gdags so //
translated: In order that the robe does not get dirty, he should make a support for the robe and attach it to the belt.

original: sgro gu yang ngo //
analyzed: sgro gu yang ngo //
translated: The belt should also be made.

original: btso blag mkhan la gos kha bsgyur ba dang kha ma bsgyur ba 'khrur gzhug par mi bya'o //üîΩde dang 'dra ba rang gis mi bya'o //
analyzed: btso blag mkhan la gos kha bsgyur ba dang kha ma bsgyur ba 'khrur gzhug par mi bya'o // de dang 'dra ba rang gis mi bya'o //
translated: He should not have a dyer or a washerman dye or wash the robe.

original: de'i ngogs su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngogs su mi bya'o //
translated: He should not do it himself, nor should he have someone else do it.

original: shing gi ngogs la mi bya'o //
analyzed: shing gi ngogs la mi bya'o //
translated: He should not do it on the bank.üîΩHe should not do it on the bank of a river.

original: gzhong pa 'jam por bkru bar mi bya'o //üîΩchu bde bas so //
analyzed: gzhong pa 'jam por bkru bar mi bya'o //üîΩchu bde bas so //
translated: He should not wash the bowl on a soft surface.üîΩHe should wash it in a comfortable way.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis mthar gyis bsgyur zhing ngo //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis mthar gyis bsgyur zhing ngo //
translated: He should wash them with both hands, turning them over.

original: mi nus na rkang pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: mi nus na rkang pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: If he is unable to do so, he should wash them with his feet.

original: de ltar khyim pas bkrur rung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar khyim pas bkrur rung ngo //
translated: In this way, a householder can wash his feet.

original: de'i gzhan du gyur par spyod pa bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhan du gyur par spyod pa bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: He should protect the other parts of his body in the same way.

original: phyag dar khrod ni legs par bkrus pa dang / btsems pa dang / kha bsgyur ba bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag dar khrod ni legs par bkrus pa dang / btsems pa dang / kha bsgyur ba bcang bar bya'o //
translated: He should keep his rag-robes well washed, sewn, and dyed.

original: mi gtsang bas gos pa'i chos gos mi bcang ngo //
analyzed: mi gtsang bas gos pa'i chos gos mi bcang ngo //
translated: He should not keep robes soiled with filth.

original: tshon bzang ba nyid du bya ba'i phyir grib ma dang nyi ma 'dren mar brdung zhing bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: tshon bzang ba nyid du bya ba'i phyir grib ma dang nyi ma 'dren mar brdung zhing bskam par bya'o //
translated: He should beat and dry them in the shade and sun alternately, in order to make them take a good dye.

original: gos dag med par bskol lo //üîΩbye brag gsum man chad du'o //
analyzed: gos dag med par bskol lo // bye brag gsum man chad du'o //
translated: He should not boil them without their cloth covering.üîΩHe should not boil them in a large amount of water.

original: mang ba nyid du 'dod pa nyid yin na lan gsum du bya'o //
analyzed: mang ba nyid du 'dod pa nyid yin na lan gsum du bya'o //
translated: If he wants to boil them in a large amount of water, he should do so three times.

original: phyi ma ches ngan pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi ma ches ngan pa nyid do //
translated: The later ones are worse than the earlier ones.

original: @70a * // de'i phyir snod tha dad par bzhag go //
analyzed: @70a * // de'i phyir snod tha dad par bzhag go //
translated: Therefore, he should keep them in separate containers.

original: kham chad gcig za ba pos rnam par ma bcad par bzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: kham chad gcig za ba pos rnam par ma bcad par bzhag par bya'o //
translated: If one is eating a single morsel, one should put aside what remains without cutting it up.

original: dud 'gro la yang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: dud 'gro la yang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give to animals.

original: bza' ba'i phyir nye bar gzhag pa las ma rdzogs par sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bza' ba'i phyir nye bar gzhag pa las ma rdzogs par sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not give from what is set aside for one's own food without completing it.

original: dad pas sbyin par bya ba nyid kyis mgron du bos pa la yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: dad pas sbyin par bya ba nyid kyis mgron du bos pa la yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do so even if one is invited to be a guest out of faith.

original: lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i lhag ma za ba rnams la ci bder bya'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i lhag ma za ba rnams la ci bder bya'o //
translated: One should do what is comfortable for those who eat the remainder of the base of the begging bowl.

original: gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
analyzed: gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
translated: One should give sacrificial cakes to the spirits who dwell in the house.

original: de dag gi cho ga'i rjes su 'brang bas snga dro la sogs par ro //
analyzed: de dag gi cho ga'i rjes su 'brang bas snga dro la sogs par ro //
translated: One should do this in the morning, etc., following the rules of the ritual.

original: cho ga tha dad pa nyid yin na thad par ro //
analyzed: cho ga tha dad pa nyid yin na thad par ro //
translated: If the rules are different, then at once.

original: aa ma dus pa ma chags pa nyid kyi gnas skabs bza' bar mi bya'o //üîΩrtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bca' bar bya ba dang 'bras chan dang zan dron dang lde gu dang sha dang snum khur dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha skam dag ni mi rung ba nyid
analyzed: aa ma dus pa ma chags pa nyid kyi gnas skabs bza' bar mi bya'o // rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bca' bar bya ba dang 'bras chan dang zan dron dang lde gu dang sha dang snum khur dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha skam dag ni mi rung ba nyid
translated: One should not eat at the wrong time, or when one is not pure.

original: ma yin no //üîΩgso ma dang @80a * //
analyzed: ma yin no // gso ma dang @80a * //
translated: One should not eat roots, stems, leaves, flowers, or fruits that are forbidden, or rice, barley, meat, oil, milk, curd, ghee, fish, or dried meat.

original: yungs kar dang rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i thug pa dag bsten par bya ba nyid ma yin par dogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: yungs kar dang rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i thug pa dag bsten par bya ba nyid ma yin par dogs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not suspect that the use of vegetables, mustard seed, roots, stems, leaves, flowers, fruits, etc., is improper.

original: chus kyang spangs na 'tshag tu 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: chus kyang spangs na 'tshag tu 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: If one avoids them because of the water, one will be purified by washing.

original: rkyal bar blugs pa ni mi rung ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rkyal bar blugs pa ni mi rung ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: But it is not improper to put it in the water to wash it.

original: snod du zan bzar rung ngo //üîΩyol gor ro //üîΩrdo las byas par yang ngo //
analyzed: snod du zan bzar rung ngo // yol gor ro // rdo las byas par yang ngo //
translated: It is proper to eat from a vessel.üîΩIt is proper to eat from a leaf.üîΩIt is proper to eat from a vessel made of stone.

original: zas byas par yang ngo //
analyzed: zas byas par yang ngo //
translated: It is proper to eat from a vessel made of clay.

original: lcags kyi lhung bzed la sogs pa bzhin du bkrus te'o //
analyzed: lcags kyi lhung bzed la sogs pa bzhin du bkrus te'o //
translated: It is proper to eat from a vessel made of metal, after washing it.

original: bkru bshal ni gnas pa'i las yin no //
analyzed: bkru bshal ni gnas pa'i las yin no //
translated: Washing and rinsing are the duties of the resident monk.

original: zos nas kyang ngo //
analyzed: zos nas kyang ngo //
translated: It is proper to eat after finishing a meal.

original: gzhan dang lhan cig tu snod gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang lhan cig tu snod gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o //
translated: It is improper to eat together with others from the same vessel.

original: lam du snod dag med na bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: lam du snod dag med na bza' bar bya'o //
translated: If there are no vessels on the road, it is proper to eat.

original: dge slong dang yang ngo //
analyzed: dge slong dang yang ngo //
translated: It is proper to eat with a monk.

original: gzhan gyis lag pa bteg na rang gis gzhug go //
analyzed: gzhan gyis lag pa bteg na rang gis gzhug go //
translated: If another raises his hand, one should enter.

original: dge tshul dang ni 'og ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge tshul dang ni 'og ma bzhin no //
translated: It is proper to eat with a novice monk as with a lower one.

original: mi ldan na lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: mi ldan na lhan cig tu'o //
translated: If one does not have it, it is proper to eat together.

original: g-yog rnams bcangs te sbyin no //
analyzed: g-yog rnams bcangs te sbyin no //
translated: It is proper to give to those who are carrying.

original: nye du bcugs pas gsol na thams cad du dben pa'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: nye du bcugs pas gsol na thams cad du dben pa'i phyogs su'o //
translated: If one is invited by relatives, it is proper to eat in all places.

original: de gnyis las byin len byas pa 'jig pa dang / byin len ma byas pa dang 'dre ba bsrung bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de gnyis las byin len byas pa 'jig pa dang / byin len ma byas pa dang 'dre ba bsrung bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should protect the two from being destroyed by the taking of the precepts and from being mixed with the unprecepted.

original: lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs te lag pa dag bsnyal du bcug nas so //
analyzed: lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs te lag pa dag bsnyal du bcug nas so //
translated: Having consecrated the alms-bowl, he should wash his hands and feet.

original: mchil lham dang bcas bzhin du bza' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mchil lham dang bcas bzhin du bza' bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not eat with his shoes on.

original: nad pas ni mnan te'o//
analyzed: nad pas ni mnan te'o//
translated: If he is sick, he may eat with his shoes on.

original: sgron me dang gos gcig pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgron me dang gos gcig pas mi bya'o //
translated: He should not eat with a lamp or a cloth.

original: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if he is sick.

original: de g-yog dag gis skyo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de g-yog dag gis skyo bar bya'o //
translated: He should be fanned by his attendants.

original: nus na rdul gzan la bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: nus na rdul gzan la bsten par bya'o //
translated: If he is able, he should rely on a dust-cloth.

original: gsang ba'i phyogs kyang ngo //
analyzed: gsang ba'i phyogs kyang ngo //
translated: He should also cover his private parts.

original: zan gyi phyir 'dug pas 'di 'am 'di nas byin cig ces 'dri ma mkhan la go bar mi bya'o//
analyzed: zan gyi phyir 'dug pas 'di 'am 'di nas byin cig ces 'dri ma mkhan la go bar mi bya'o//
translated: He should not ask the waiter, ‚ÄúGive me this or that,‚Äù for the sake of food.

original: nad pas 'phrod pa la ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: nad pas 'phrod pa la ni ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if he is sick.

original: dper na drod chung bas tshos pa dang drod che bas rlon pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na drod chung bas tshos pa dang drod che bas rlon pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, if he is weak, he may eat cooked food; if he is strong, he may eat raw food.

original: bdag nyid la nad pa'i 'du shes dang zas la sman gyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la nad pa'i 'du shes dang zas la sman gyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste bza' bar bya'o //
translated: He should eat with the perception of himself as sick and with the perception of the food as medicine.

original: dran pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dran pa yang ngo //
translated: He should also be mindful.

original: 'byung ba dang 'dra ba dang 'gyur ba dang phyir rgol ba nyid dang / rgyu mthun pa dang brten pa'i rnam pa dang btsal ba dang gzhan la rag las pa nyid dang / nad pa dang bcas pa nyid dang / so sor 'gro ba nyid dag gis mi mthun pa nyid du gzhag go //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang 'dra ba dang 'gyur ba dang phyir rgol ba nyid dang / rgyu mthun pa dang brten pa'i rnam pa dang btsal ba dang gzhan la rag las pa nyid dang / nad pa dang bcas pa nyid dang / so sor 'gro ba nyid dag gis mi mthun pa nyid du gzhag go //
translated: It is to be established as adverse through the aspects of origination, change, opposition, natural outcome, dependence, search, dependence on another, sickness, and separation.

original: dran pa nye bar gnas pas so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas pas so //
translated: It is through the establishment of mindfulness.

original: sems rnam par ma g-yengs pas so //
analyzed: sems rnam par ma g-yengs pas so //
translated: It is through the non-distraction of mind.

original: @80b shes bzhin gyi sgra bskyung zhing ngo //üîΩde mi bya bar ro //üîΩmi 'byung bar thug pa dag go //
analyzed: @80b shes bzhin gyi sgra bskyung zhing ngo // de mi bya bar ro // mi 'byung bar thug pa dag go //
translated: It is through the quietude of the voice of introspection.üîΩIt is through the non-performance of that.

original: khrum khrum mi bya bar ro //
analyzed: khrum khrum mi bya bar ro //
translated: It is through the non-occurrence of that.üîΩIt is through the non-rubbing of the hands.

original: skra 'byung ba dag chu la sogs pas snyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: skra 'byung ba dag chu la sogs pas snyi bar bya'o //
translated: It is through the softening of the hair of the head with water, etc.

original: bza' ba de'i don du rol mo byed du mi gzhug go //
analyzed: bza' ba de'i don du rol mo byed du mi gzhug go //
translated: It is through the non-performance of music for the sake of food.

original: bshad pa byas pa nyid du mi bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa byas pa nyid du mi bya'o //
translated: It is through the non-performance of the recitation as it is explained.

original: de so sor rig par bya'o//
analyzed: de so sor rig par bya'o//
translated: It is through the individual understanding of that.

original: dus yol bar 'gyur na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis sam gsum du'o //
analyzed: dus yol bar 'gyur na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis sam gsum du'o //
translated: It is through the two or three verses at the end of the period.

original: zos nas gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon no //
analyzed: zos nas gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon no //
translated: After eating, one should recite the verses of the scriptures.

original: zos nas mgron du bos pa la yon bshad pa dang chos bshad pa dag go //
analyzed: zos nas mgron du bos pa la yon bshad pa dang chos bshad pa dag go //
translated: After eating, one should explain the merits of the donor and the Dharma to those who were invited.

original: thams cad kyis zos zin pa nyid du nges par shes nas so //
analyzed: thams cad kyis zos zin pa nyid du nges par shes nas so //
translated: One should know for certain that all have finished eating.

original: kun tu blta bas so //
analyzed: kun tu blta bas so //
translated: One should look all around.

original: du ma nyid na dang pos so //
analyzed: du ma nyid na dang pos so //
translated: If there are many, one should start with the first.

original: mi nus na nus pa gzhan la bcol lo //
analyzed: mi nus na nus pa gzhan la bcol lo //
translated: If one is unable, one should entrust it to another who is able.

original: gal te ma byas par dge slong rnams 'gro ba'i rkyen byung na 'khor tha na bzhi yan chad sbyin no //
analyzed: gal te ma byas par dge slong rnams 'gro ba'i rkyen byung na 'khor tha na bzhi yan chad sbyin no //
translated: If the condition of the monks going arises before it is done, one should give to the assembly of at least four.

original: de la rkyen byung na sbyin bdag la zhus te'o //
analyzed: de la rkyen byung na sbyin bdag la zhus te'o //
translated: If the condition arises there, one should ask the donor.

original: yon 'chad pa na dga' bo dang nye dga' dag gi ming smos par bya'o //
analyzed: yon 'chad pa na dga' bo dang nye dga' dag gi ming smos par bya'o //
translated: When explaining the merits, one should mention the names of Nanda and Upananda.

original: mid pa nyid pas dus ma yin pa'i sgregs pa dag dang por gnyis sam gsum bor te kha bkrus nas mid bar bya'o //
analyzed: mid pa nyid pas dus ma yin pa'i sgregs pa dag dang por gnyis sam gsum bor te kha bkrus nas mid bar bya'o //
translated: Because of swallowing, if there are untimely belches, one should first spit out two or three times, wash one's mouth, and then swallow.

original: de ni zas ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni zas ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not food.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyis dus ma yin pa dang spangs pa'i tshe sgregs pa byung na kha bkru bar bya'o //üîΩma bshams pa'i phyogs su mchil ma dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyis dus ma yin pa dang spangs pa'i tshe sgregs pa byung na kha bkru bar bya'o // ma bshams pa'i phyogs su mchil ma dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, when others belch at the wrong time or when they have finished eating, they should rinse their mouths.üîΩOne should not spit in an unprepared place.

original: byi dor byas par yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: byi dor byas par yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not spit on the ground.

original: sos lce btsir te yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: sos lce btsir te yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not spit with a hissing sound.

original: de dang de'i sgra dkon mchog dang bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o //üîΩza ba'i drung du yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de'i sgra dkon mchog dang bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o // za ba'i drung du yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make that sound in the presence of the Three Jewels or one‚Äôs teachers.üîΩOne should not make it in the presence of those who are eating.

original: lhag ma'i drung du yang dang yang du mi bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma'i drung du yang dang yang du mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make it repeatedly in the presence of those who are not eating.

original: mi nus na gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi nus na gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If one is unable to do so, one should go elsewhere.

original: gzhan la mi bde bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la mi bde bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make others uncomfortable.

original: sngur sgra can gyis nyal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sngur sgra can gyis nyal bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sleep with a snoring sound.

original: des bcag pa'am gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: des bcag pa'am gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should break it or go elsewhere.

original: de'i snod ni glang po che'i rmig mthil lta bu'am brtsegs ma'o //
analyzed: de'i snod ni glang po che'i rmig mthil lta bu'am brtsegs ma'o //
translated: One‚Äôs spittoon should be like the hoof of an elephant or a pile.

original: de nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should keep it nearby.

original: der so phag gi phye ma'am thal ba dag gi gcal blugs so //
analyzed: der so phag gi phye ma'am thal ba dag gi gcal blugs so //
translated: One should spread cow dung or ash on it.

original: sbrang bu dag bskrad pa ni gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: sbrang bu dag bskrad pa ni gnyen po yin no //
translated: The remedy is to drive away the flies.

original: dri pa bar mi 'gyur ba dang srog chags 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dus dus su bkru ba dang bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: dri pa bar mi 'gyur ba dang srog chags 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dus dus su bkru ba dang bskam par bya'o //
translated: From time to time, the monks should wash and dry the urine pot and excrement container so that they do not emit an unpleasant smell and so that insects do not develop in them.

original: de'i dus kyi ched du gzhan nya par gzhag go //üîΩmi brel bar bya ba'i phyir gtsug lag khang @81a * //
analyzed: de'i dus kyi ched du gzhan nya par gzhag go // mi brel bar bya ba'i phyir gtsug lag khang @81a * //
translated: For this purpose, they should be given to the novices.

original: gi grva ka ba bzhi po dag gi ngos su yang mchil ma'i snod dag gzhag par bya'o //üîΩrlung gi las sgra dang bcas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gi grva ka ba bzhi po dag gi ngos su yang mchil ma'i snod dag gzhag par bya'o // rlung gi las sgra dang bcas par mi bya'o //
translated: In order to avoid confusion, the monks should place a spittoon in each of the four corners of the temple.

original: dkon mchog dang bla ma'i mdun du mi btang ngo //
analyzed: dkon mchog dang bla ma'i mdun du mi btang ngo //
translated: The wind should not be allowed to carry the spittle into the presence of the Three Jewels or the gurus.

original: gzhan gyi mdun du yang dang yang du mi btang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mdun du yang dang yang du mi btang ngo //
translated: Nor should it be allowed to fall repeatedly in the presence of others.üîΩOne should not defecate or urinate while standing.üîΩOne should not defecate or urinate in water or on land.üîΩOne should not defecate or urinate on green grass.

original: shing ljon pa'i drung du bshang ba dang gci ba dag mi bya'o //üîΩdgon par de dag gi skabs med pa nyid yin na ma gtogs so //üîΩtsher ma can gyi yang ngo //
analyzed: shing ljon pa'i drung du bshang ba dang gci ba dag mi bya'o // dgon par de dag gi skabs med pa nyid yin na ma gtogs so // tsher ma can gyi yang ngo //
translated: One should not defecate or urinate while holding on to a tree.

original: bshang ba'i bskyab bya'o //
analyzed: bshang ba'i bskyab bya'o //
translated: One should not defecate or urinate without spreading something out to protect the ground.

original: gal te gtsug lag khang du na nub bam byang gi ngos su'o //
analyzed: gal te gtsug lag khang du na nub bam byang gi ngos su'o //
translated: If in the monastery, on the western or northern side.

original: gsong ldong ngam phug rdugs so //
analyzed: gsong ldong ngam phug rdugs so //
translated: In a secluded place or in a cave.

original: 'og tu shing tsher ma can dag bskyed par bya'o //üîΩsteng du bu gu'i nye 'khor du rkang rten dag gzhug go //
analyzed: 'og tu shing tsher ma can dag bskyed par bya'o // steng du bu gu'i nye 'khor du rkang rten dag gzhug go //
translated: Below, he should plant thorny trees.üîΩAbove, he should place a hole in the floor and a foot-rest.

original: ril ba spyi blugs gzhag par bya'o //üîΩsgo bsnol mar gdod do //
analyzed: ril ba spyi blugs gzhag par bya'o // sgo bsnol mar gdod do //
translated: He should place a water-pot.üîΩHe should close the door.

original: sgo glegs gzhug go //
analyzed: sgo glegs gzhug go //
translated: He should put in a bolt.

original: yang mig dang sgo gtan dag kyang gzhug go //
analyzed: yang mig dang sgo gtan dag kyang gzhug go //
translated: He should also put in a latch and a lock.

original: 'jug par 'dod pas sgra bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug par 'dod pas sgra bya'o //
translated: If he wishes to enter, he should make a noise.

original: der zhugs pas kyang thos na'o //
analyzed: der zhugs pas kyang thos na'o //
translated: If he hears a response, he should enter.

original: gos legs par brdzes pas shes bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: gos legs par brdzes pas shes bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: He should enter mindfully, having well arranged his robe.

original: dkyil du 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil du 'dug par bya'o //
translated: He should sit down in the middle.

original: rkang rten gnyis la mi gos par khad kyis bya'o //üîΩmi 'ong na bsdad par mi bya'o //üîΩ'ong na dgag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rkang rten gnyis la mi gos par khad kyis bya'o // mi 'ong na bsdad par mi bya'o // 'ong na dgag par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not sit on the foot-rest.üîΩIf the other does not come, he should not wait.üîΩIf the other does come, he should not block the door.

original: de dang 'brel pa'i don las gzhan pas de'i drung du 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i don las gzhan pas de'i drung du 'dug par bya'o //
translated: He should sit down in front of him, but not too close.

original: rkang pa bkru ba dang 'thor 'thung bya ba dag tu yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba dang 'thor 'thung bya ba dag tu yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same applies to washing the feet and drinking water.

original: dge skos kyis nyi ma re re zhing byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: dge skos kyis nyi ma re re zhing byi dor bya'o //
translated: The duties of the monastery attendant are to clean the monastery every day.

original: sa dang lo ma bzhag pa yang ngo //
analyzed: sa dang lo ma bzhag pa yang ngo //
translated: He should also set out earth and water.

original: lo ma ni phyi bar bya ba'i bong rdog la sogs pa dag gi dpe yin no //üîΩphyogs ma yin par gci bar mi bya'o //üîΩdu mar mi bya'o //
analyzed: lo ma ni phyi bar bya ba'i bong rdog la sogs pa dag gi dpe yin no // phyogs ma yin par gci bar mi bya'o // du mar mi bya'o //
translated: The earth is for cleaning the teeth and so on.üîΩOne should not urinate in the wrong place.üîΩOne should not urinate in a line.

original: rgyun gyi khung sgor gzhug go //
analyzed: rgyun gyi khung sgor gzhug go //
translated: One should not urinate in a stream.

original: gci ba'i bskyab bya'o //üîΩde'i glor ro //
analyzed: gci ba'i bskyab bya'o // de'i glor ro //
translated: One should not urinate in a hole.üîΩOne should not urinate in a place where there is a hole.

original: phug rdugs la wa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: phug rdugs la wa gzhug par bya'o //

analyzed: chos kyi tshul shing dag ni ya yo med pa dang khyar khyor med pa dang chas chus med pa dang kha dog bzang ba dang dri zhim pa dang reg pa 'jam pa nyid dag yin la cig shos kyi ni bzlog pa'o //

original: dge 'dun la 'du bar gsol lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la 'du bar gsol lo //

original: tshul shing 'brim par 'gyur @91a * //
analyzed: tshul shing 'brim par 'gyur @91a * //

original: gyis thams cad kyis 'du bar bya'o zhes so //üîΩgal te de ltar 'dun pa sbyin pas tshogs pa na chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lhag par 'gyur bar sems na brim par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gyis thams cad kyis 'du bar bya'o zhes so // gal te de ltar 'dun pa sbyin pas tshogs pa na chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lhag par 'gyur bar sems na brim par mi bya'o //
translated: Everyone should vote.üîΩIf he thinks that the votes for the Dharma will be in the minority, he should not distribute the tickets.

original: 'bri ma pa'i tsho lag pa g-yas pas chos kyi tshul shing dag gzung zhing g-yon pas cig shos dag go //
analyzed: 'bri ma pa'i tsho lag pa g-yas pas chos kyi tshul shing dag gzung zhing g-yon pas cig shos dag go //
translated: The distributor should hold the Dharma tickets in his right hand and the other kind in his left hand.

original: de dag g-yogs te snga ma dag snang bar byas nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag g-yogs te snga ma dag snang bar byas nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having covered them, he should reveal the former and say:

original: gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing ya yo med pa khyar khyor med pa chas chus med pa kha dog bzang ba dri zhim pa reg pa 'jam pa dag yin gyis long shig ces so ;
analyzed: gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing ya yo med pa khyar khyor med pa chas chus med pa kha dog bzang ba dri zhim pa reg pa 'jam pa dag yin gyis long shig ces so ;
translated: ‚ÄúSthavira, these Dharma-vinaya sticks are straight, not crooked, not broken, of good color, good smell, and good touch. Take them.‚Äù

original: / cig shos tshol na tshig gnyis kyi bar du mi dbul lo //
analyzed: / cig shos tshol na tshig gnyis kyi bar du mi dbul lo //
translated: If he seeks the other, he should not give out the sticks between the two statements.

original: g-yogs sam phye ba gang gis chos kyi mang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brim par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yogs sam phye ba gang gis chos kyi mang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brim par bya'o //
translated: He should distribute them in such a way that the Dharma-vinaya sticks will be more.

original: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon gcig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smon 'grin dang 'grogs ba shes kyis chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon gcig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smon 'grin dang 'grogs ba shes kyis chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable, you know the preceptor, the teacher, those with the same preceptor, those with the same teacher, those with whom you have conversed, those with whom you have spoken intimately, those with whom you have associated. Take the Dharma-vinaya stick.

original: long shig / khyod de dag dang lhan cig rtsod par gyur na ma legs so zhes rna drung du gshub bo //
analyzed: long shig / khyod de dag dang lhan cig rtsod par gyur na ma legs so zhes rna drung du gshub bo //
translated: You should not argue with them.

original: chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not take a voting ticket for what is contrary to the Dharma.

original: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag ma dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag ma dris par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it without asking those who uphold the sutras, the Vinaya, and the mƒÅt·πõkƒÅ.

original: dbyen du 'gyur ba'i bzod pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: dbyen du 'gyur ba'i bzod pas mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it with the approval of those who are in schism.

original: chos ma yin pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it with what is contrary to the Dharma.

original: de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes na mi bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes na mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it if one knows that it will lead to a schism.

original: mnyam pa nyid na nyan thos chen po'i phyir chos kyi tshul shing gcig blang ngo //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid na nyan thos chen po'i phyir chos kyi tshul shing gcig blang ngo //
translated: If it is equal, one should take a Dharma voting ticket because of the great ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs mi bya'o //
translated: One should not disturb the peace with what is contrary to the Dharma.

original: gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa la ni dag pa sbyin no //
analyzed: gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa la ni dag pa sbyin no //
translated: One should give purity to those who are free from the fault of accusation.

original: gleng pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gleng pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: There are four kinds of accusation:

original: gzhi med pa dang / gzhi gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa'i dbang gis dang / phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / smyon pas byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi med pa dang / gzhi gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa'i dbang gis dang / phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / smyon pas byas pa'o //

original: dang po gsum la ni dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no //
analyzed: dang po gsum la ni dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no //

original: tha ma la ni ma smyos pas 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: tha ma la ni ma smyos pas 'dul ba'o //

original: ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug long rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug long rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of quarrels, because of the presence of downfalls:

original: phyir 'phros pa med pa dang / phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pa rnam pa gnyis po nye tshe ba dang / dge @91b 'dun mtha' dag dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: phyir 'phros pa med pa dang / phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pa rnam pa gnyis po nye tshe ba dang / dge @91b 'dun mtha' dag dang 'brel ba'o //

original: dang po las ni khas blang ba'i bya bas phyir bcos so //
analyzed: dang po las ni khas blang ba'i bya bas phyir bcos so //

analyzed: gsum pa las ni rtsva bkram pa lta bus so //

analyzed: 'di la mang po dag gi don du dge 'dun ma yin pa la bshags par bya ba dag ni gcig gis phyir bcos par bya'o //
translated: Here, in the case of the confession to be made to the community for the sake of many people, one person restores it.

original: du ma dag cig car du yang ngo //
analyzed: du ma dag cig car du yang ngo //
translated: And many people do it at the same time.

original: gang yin pa zhes smos pa dang shes pa snang bar bya bas so //
analyzed: gang yin pa zhes smos pa dang shes pa snang bar bya bas so //
translated: It is said that one should do it by means of the appearance of knowledge of what it is.

original: phyogs gzhan gyis kyang mthun par gyur na'o //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan gyis kyang mthun par gyur na'o //
translated: And if the other side also becomes harmonious.

original: khas mi len pa dang don med pa la ni bshags pa mi 'chags so //üîΩlhan cig gi dngos pos gleng ba nyid du rung ngo //
analyzed: khas mi len pa dang don med pa la ni bshags pa mi 'chags so // lhan cig gi dngos pos gleng ba nyid du rung ngo //
translated: Confession is not made to those who do not accept it or to those who are not worthy of it.üîΩOne is fit to be a confessor by virtue of the possession of certain qualities.

original: gleng ba po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gleng ba po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The confessor also must possess certain qualities.

original: 'di la grangs kyi bye brag ni nges pa med do //
analyzed: 'di la grangs kyi bye brag ni nges pa med do //
translated: There is no fixed number of qualities.

original: gleng ba pos lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag shes pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang 'dul ba la log pa dang / de las bzlog pa dag mi ston pa nyid ces bya ba gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o //
analyzed: gleng ba pos lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag shes pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang 'dul ba la log pa dang / de las bzlog pa dag mi ston pa nyid ces bya ba gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o //
translated: The confessor should be restrained in body and speech, know the scriptures, and not teach the Dharma and the Vinaya wrongly in the midst of the community.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba dang log par ston pa la mthun par mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba dang log par ston pa la mthun par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not associate with those who have broken their vows or teach wrongly.

original: rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa sde snod dag 'dzin zhing mi shes pa la ni slon gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa sde snod dag 'dzin zhing mi shes pa la ni slon gdab par bya'o //

original: de la bsam pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de la bsam pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
translated: In order to understand their intentions, one should question and examine them.

original: gnas su mi gzhag pas so //
analyzed: gnas su mi gzhag pas so //

original: gnas ni dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang rjes su bsgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: gnas ni dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang rjes su bsgrub pa dag go //
translated: The place is the time, the place, the manner of behavior, and the practice.

original: gnas gzhan du 'pho ba dang rnyog pa can du gyur na gleng ba ni 'chags so //
analyzed: gnas gzhan du 'pho ba dang rnyog pa can du gyur na gleng ba ni 'chags so //
translated: When the place is changed or becomes disturbed, the accusation is settled.

original: gleng bas khas blangs na mthar thug pa yin no //
analyzed: gleng bas khas blangs na mthar thug pa yin no //
translated: When the accusation is accepted, it is concluded.

original: smra ba bo bden pa mthong ba nyid dang yon tan las ches mchog tu gyur pa khyim pa yin yang rung gzhan tshad mar bya'o //
analyzed: smra ba bo bden pa mthong ba nyid dang yon tan las ches mchog tu gyur pa khyim pa yin yang rung gzhan tshad mar bya'o //
translated: Even if the one who speaks is a householder, who has not seen the truth, and is not an authority, one should take the word of another who is an authority.

original: gzhan dang bcas pa nyid yin na tshig bstun par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang bcas pa nyid yin na tshig bstun par bya'o //
translated: If there is another who is an authority, one should follow his word.

original: the tshom nyid du gyur na shes pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: the tshom nyid du gyur na shes pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: If there is doubt, it is not knowledge.

original: de las nges par gyur pa ni khas blangs pa dang 'dra'o /
analyzed: de las nges par gyur pa ni khas blangs pa dang 'dra'o /

analyzed: ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa 'di la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin par bya ba nyid do //

original: nges pa dang bral ba ni khyad du gsod pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa dang bral ba ni khyad du gsod pa yin no //

original: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas khyad du gsod na nges par 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin no //üîΩde ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba la @92a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas khyad du gsod na nges par 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin no // de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba la @92a * //

original: phan pa yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: phan pa yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa nyid do //
translated: It is in conformity with the search for the essential nature of the offense, because it is beneficial for that.

original: kha cig gis 'di nan tur gyi tshul du bstan no //
analyzed: kha cig gis 'di nan tur gyi tshul du bstan no //

original: 'di ni mi bzang ste mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mi bzang ste mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //

original: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad par ni mi bzhed de /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad par ni mi bzhed de /

analyzed: bsdigs pa la sogs pa ni de nyid yin pas rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because coercion and so on are included in that category and are not established separately.

original: de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na yod bzhin du ma mthong ba nyid kyis shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na yod bzhin du ma mthong ba nyid kyis shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one thinks that he violates it knowingly, he should be made to confess it, because he has generated the knowledge that he has violated it, even though he has not seen it.

analyzed: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa mi skyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not fail to make an effort to pacify him.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi'o /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi'o /
translated: The basis of dispute.

original: // / zhi ba thams cad ni bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: // / zhi ba thams cad ni bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'jug go //
translated: All the peaceful ones enter into dispute for the sake of action.

original: kha bskang bar 'os pa ma yin pa ni dge 'dun gyi tha snyad la tshogs par dbyung ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: kha bskang bar 'os pa ma yin pa ni dge 'dun gyi tha snyad la tshogs par dbyung ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: The one who is not worthy of being added is not to be expelled from the assembly of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: gzhan gyi dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya'o //

original: bud med rnams kyi ni skyes pas rigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyi ni skyes pas rigs pa nyid do //

original: srog gam bsnyen par rdzogs pa las nyams na nye bar zhi ba nyid do //
analyzed: srog gam bsnyen par rdzogs pa las nyams na nye bar zhi ba nyid do //

original: spangs pa nyid nas gzhan gyi phyogs kyi bar du gyur na yang ngo //
analyzed: spangs pa nyid nas gzhan gyi phyogs kyi bar du gyur na yang ngo //
translated: Even if one has been abandoned up to the other side,

analyzed: gzhan du song ngam nad kyi rnam pa yun ring pos btab na yang ngo //
translated: if one has gone elsewhere or been struck down by a long illness,

original: don sbyin par byed pa 'am mngon par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: don sbyin par byed pa 'am mngon par brtson pa'o //

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi rdzogs so /

original: // // so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: // // so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o //
translated: One who has gone forth with the highest restraint of individual liberation should pay homage.

original: mnyan na rgan pa la'o //
analyzed: mnyan na rgan pa la'o //
translated: If one listens, then to the elder.

original: mtshan tha mi dad pa la'o //
analyzed: mtshan tha mi dad pa la'o //

original: skyes pa mi dman pa la bud med kyis so //üîΩsa gzhan na gnas pa dang nyams pa dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang tha dad par gnas pa dang mtshams med pa byas pa dang nyal ba dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang brel ba dang sems gzhan du
analyzed: skyes pa mi dman pa la bud med kyis so // sa gzhan na gnas pa dang nyams pa dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang tha dad par gnas pa dang mtshams med pa byas pa dang nyal ba dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang brel ba dang sems gzhan du
translated: If one is not inferior to a man, then to a woman.

original: song ba dang rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang khyim gzhan na 'dug pa dang / zas kyi gral na 'dug pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: song ba dang rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang khyim gzhan na 'dug pa dang / zas kyi gral na 'dug pa ma gtogs so //
translated: One should not give the full ordination to one who is on another stage, who is degenerate, who has caused a schism in the Sangha, who is in a faction that is unfavorable to the Dharma, who is living separately, who has committed a heinous act, who is lying down, who is in meditative equipoise, who is busy, whose mind has gone elsewhere, who has turned his back, who is in another house, or who is in the row of meals.

original: khyim pas rab tu byung ba la'o //
analyzed: khyim pas rab tu byung ba la'o //

original: thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la'o //
translated: All should give the full ordination to a Buddha.

original: gtsug lag khang bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang bya'o //
translated: One should build a temple.

original: ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang bya ba nyid do //
translated: In the middle of one side, one should build a fragrant chamber.

original: de'i mdun du sgo khang ngo //
analyzed: de'i mdun du sgo khang ngo //
translated: In front of that, a gatehouse.

original: gru bzhi bzang ba nyid do //
analyzed: gru bzhi bzang ba nyid do //
translated: It should be square and excellent.

original: khyams gsum pa yang ngo //
analyzed: khyams gsum pa yang ngo //

original: @92b mnod par bya'o //
analyzed: @92b mnod par bya'o //
translated: One should take possession of it.

original: gtsug lag khang du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du gnas par bya'o //

original: gnas dag dge 'dun gyi gzhir dge 'dun gyi phyir ram gang zag dge slong gi phyir gnas kyi gzhi byed pa rjes su gnang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas dag dge 'dun gyi gzhir dge 'dun gyi phyir ram gang zag dge slong gi phyir gnas kyi gzhi byed pa rjes su gnang bar bya'o //
translated: It is permitted to make a monastery for the Sa·πÖgha or for an individual monk in a place belonging to the Sa·πÖgha.

original: gal te sbyin bdag yod na des rjes su gnang na'o //
analyzed: gal te sbyin bdag yod na des rjes su gnang na'o //
translated: If there is a donor, he should give permission.

original: grong khyer gyi phyi rol lam nang du bsti ba'i gnas dag rung ngo //
analyzed: grong khyer gyi phyi rol lam nang du bsti ba'i gnas dag rung ngo //
translated: It is suitable to make a place of worship outside or inside the city.

original: rang gi khron pa bar du bcang ba'i phyir rtsig gu bya bas kun nas chags pa'i shes pa bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi khron pa bar du bcang ba'i phyir rtsig gu bya bas kun nas chags pa'i shes pa bsal bar bya'o //
translated: In order to prevent the well from being filled up, a fence should be made.

original: snyim pa bkang ste blud pas bud med rjes su gzung bar bya zhing chu'i rgyun mi 'chad par blugs pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: snyim pa bkang ste blud pas bud med rjes su gzung bar bya zhing chu'i rgyun mi 'chad par blugs pas mi bya'o //
translated: A woman should be given water by filling her cupped hands, but one should not pour water continuously.

original: de'i dus nyid kyi dbyar gyi nang du 'ongs pa ni rnyed pa dbang ngo //
analyzed: de'i dus nyid kyi dbyar gyi nang du 'ongs pa ni rnyed pa dbang ngo //
translated: If she comes during the rainy season, she should receive her share of the offerings.

original: za zhing rnyed pa ma byin pa la ni las mi rigs so //
analyzed: za zhing rnyed pa ma byin pa la ni las mi rigs so //
translated: It is not proper to work for one who does not give offerings while eating.

original: las su ni gzhon rims nas mthar gyis bsko'o //
analyzed: las su ni gzhon rims nas mthar gyis bsko'o //
translated: In work, the youngest should be appointed first, and so on in order.
